#set($list = false) #set($list = $sharepoint_v2_list.Current) #if(!$list) #set($lists = false) #set($lists = $sharepoint_v2_list.List($core_v2_group.Current.Id, "%{PageIndex = 0, PageSize = 1}")) #if ($lists && $lists.Errors.Count() == 0 && $lists.TotalCount == 1) #set($list = $lists.get_item(0)) #end #end
